list.details: When building applications, reusing common business use cases in the same or multiple Apps happens regularly. A Block is the basic unit of an app that solves a business use case.
From a developer's perspective, A Block encases any specific functionality. Building a Block or reusing it is as easy as writing an ordinary function.
Each Block has a type for the kind of functionality it performs. The Block types are: UI Blocks (classified as Fn Blocks, UI-Element Blocks and UI-Container Blocks), Shared Blocks and Appblocks.
